name: olop

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c0, clat))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ OL, c0 ∈ OP, c0 ∈ Lat)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c0, cops))
-| wb(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cops)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ OL → c0 ∈ OP)
⊣ (c0 ∈ OL ↔(c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c0 ∈ OP))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c0, cops))
-| wb(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cops)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ OL → c0 ∈ OP)
⊣ (c0 ∈ OL ↔(c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c0 ∈ OP))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cops)))

comment: An ortholattice is an orthoposet. (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2011.)
